info_message.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this?
info_message.user_package_is_expired: Your current package has expired and your access is limited. Please get a new package!

success_message.basic: Your requested command was performed successfully!

error_message.empty_fields: You must fill all the fields!
error_message.invalid_captcha: The captcha code is not valid!
error_message.invalid_csrf_token: The action could not be finished because the protector has expired, please try again!
error_message.basic: We could not perform your requested command!

user_activation.subject: Welcome {{NAME}}! - Activation email
user_activation.body:
Hey there {{NAME}},

We are glad you joined us!

One more step and you are ready,

you just need to click the following link in order to join {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}

Activate your account

Greetings from {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}!

user_lost_password.subject: Reset your password - {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}
user_lost_password.body:
Hey {{NAME}},

This is your reset password link: Reset Password

If you did not request this, you can ignore it!

Greetings from {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}!

user_payment.subject: Payment received - {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}
user_payment.body:
Hey there,

This is a confirmation that your payment has been received by us.

Your account plan is now paid until {{PACKAGE_EXPIRATION_DATE}}!

You can also check all the payments you made, change your plan or cancel it.

Greetings from {{WEBSITE_TITLE}}!

user_data_send.subject: New data collected for %s campaign - %s notification
user_data_send.body:
Here is everything we have collected from the %s Campaign - %s Notification.

%s

admin_new_user_notification.subject: New User Registered!
admin_new_user_notification.body:
Hey!

A new user just registered to the website!

Welcome %s with the %s email to your website!

admin_new_payment_notification.subject: New Payment via %s of %s %s!
admin_new_payment_notification.body:
Hey!

A user just paid %s %s to the website!

Here's to more earnings!

twofa.secret_help: Try inserting the following secret code into your app if you can't scan the QR Code.
twofa.verify_help: To confirm that you setup your code properly, please enter the 8-digit token from your mobile app.

preview.subheader: Overall preview of how it would look like.

settings.title: Title Message
settings.conversion_title_help: You can insert dynamic variables from your Conversion Data. Example: If you have a field named full_name, you can use it as {full_name}.
settings.conversion_active_help: You can insert dynamic variables from your Conversion Data as mentioned in the Conversion Title.
settings.image_help: Leave empty for no image. Hint: icons8.com has a good library of small icons that you can use.
settings.url_help: The URL you want to user to go to after clicking the notification. Leave empty for no link.
settings.button_text_help: Leave empty to remove the button completely.
settings.share_url_help: Leave empty if you want the URL to be dynamic to the current page where the notification is shown.
settings.show_agreement_help: Require the user to confirm his agreement by ticking a checkbox.
settings.trigger_type_page_contains_placeholder: Text that is included in the website
settings.display_trigger_help: On what event the notification should show up.
settings.display_trigger_delay_placeholder: Number of seconds to wait until notification shows up
settings.display_trigger_scroll_placeholder: Percent of scrolling from the top down
settings.display_frequency_help: How often should the notification trigger?.
settings.display_mobile_help: Wether or not to display the notification on when pixels available are smaller than 768px.
settings.display_desktop_help: Wether or not to display the notification on when pixels available are bigger than 768px.
settings.display_duration_help: How many seconds to display the notification. Set -1 to display forever.
settings.display_position_help: Position of the notification on the screen. Position doesn't change on the preview.
settings.display_minimum_activity_help: Minimum data needed to display the notification.
settings.border_width_help: Value from 0 to 5 for the border width of the notification.
settings.border_radius_help: Change the shape of the corners of the notification
settings.shadow_help: Enable or disable the shadow around the edges of the notification
settings.data_send_is_enabled: Send caught data to external sources
settings.data_send_webhook_help: Leave empty to disable this field.
settings.data_send_email_help: Leave empty to disable this field.
settings.data_trigger_webhook_help: Call the endpoint to let us know about an event or conversion that happened on your website related to this notification, we'll do the rest. The call MUST be a POST request and can have any form data parameters.
settings.data_trigger_auto_help: Setting the Auto Capture option will try to automatically detect when a form has been submitted and record that data for you. ( Password fields will never be captured )

statistics.disabled: As of now, the analytics for notifications are not enabled.
statistics.subheader_top_pages: Most active pages on which notifications had most activity.
statistics.total_uniques_help: Unique refers to 1 unique device in a 24 hour period.
statistics.total_sessions_help: Multiple sessions can be tracked per one unique device in one day.

informational.name: Informational
informational.description: Fully customizable informational message for your users.
informational.description_default: Limited sale until tonight, right now!

coupon.name: Coupon
coupon.description: The best way to let your users know that you are running a sale.
coupon.footer_text_default: No, I don't want to save money!

live_counter.name: Live Counter
live_counter.description: Show your visitors how many people are on your site to create more trust.

email_collector.name: Email Collector
email_collector.description: Easily collect emails and generate leads from your users.
email_collector.description_default: We do not send out spam emails & you can unsubscribe at any point.
email_collector.agreement_text_default: I read & agree the Privacy Policy

latest_conversion.name: Latest Conversion
latest_conversion.description: Establish social proof by displaying your most recent conversions on your site.

conversions_counter.name: Conversions Counter
conversions_counter.description: Establish social proof by showing how many recent conversions you've got.

video.name: Video
video.description: Easily display a small widget with an informative YouTube video.

social_share.name: Social Share
social_share.description: Let others share your content and generate more traffic for you.
social_share.description_default: We appreciate all the shares to support us! Thank you!

random_review.name: Random Review
random_review.description: Display a random review/testimonial from your clients to create social proof.

emoji_feedback.name: Emoji Feedback
emoji_feedback.description: An interactive way for your users to give you feedback about your site.

cookie_notification.name: Cookie Notification
cookie_notification.description: Notify your users that you are using cookies on your site.
cookie_notification.description_default: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.

score_feedback.name: Score Feedback
score_feedback.description: The easiest way for your users to give you a score feedback.

request_collector.name: Request Collector
request_collector.description: Collecting leads has never been easier with the request collector.
request_collector.content_description_default: Let us know and we will get back to you!
request_collector.agreement_text_default: I read & agree the Privacy Policy

countdown_collector.name: Countdown Collector

countdown_collector.content_title_default: Hurry up! Registrations are closing soon.
countdown_collector.agreement_text_default: I read & agree the Privacy Policy

informational_bar.name: Informational Bar
informational_bar.description: Fully customizable informational bar for the top or bottom.

image.name: Image
image.description: Display a small widget with an informative Image of your choice.

collector_bar.name: Collector Bar
collector_bar.description: Collect emails or leads without distracting the users.
collector_bar.title_default: Sign up to receive updates & discounts via email
collector_bar.agreement_text_default: I read & agree the Privacy Policy

coupon_bar.name: Coupon Bar
coupon_bar.description: Top or bottom simple bar to give your visitors a nice coupon for them to use.
coupon_bar.title_default: We're running a limited sale until the end of the day 🙌

button_bar.name: Button Bar
button_bar.description: Top or bottom cool bar to promote anything to your visitors.
button_bar.title_default: We just launched our new product feature 🔥

collector_modal.name: Modal Collector
collector_modal.description: Collect leads with a nice looking and big modal.
collector_modal.description_default: We do not send out spam emails & you can unsubscribe at any point.
collector_modal.agreement_text_default: I read & agree the Privacy Policy

collector_two_modal.name: Modal Two Collector

collector_two_modal.description_default: We do not send out spam emails & you can unsubscribe at any point.

button_modal.name: Call to action

header.subheader: Here you can get the script code that you can use on any domain of yours.

install.step_one_help: Copy and paste the following JS Code Snippet before the end of the </head> of any website that you want to display notifications from us.
install.step_two_help: Now the only thing left to do is to make sure to access your website ( clear cache ) and get back to us for confirmation.
install.active_help: All domains which receive no visits for 30 days and the pixel code is not installed will automatically be considered inactive.
install.step_three_help: Go to the Dashboard and create a new Campaign for your domain and then you can start to create notifications.

index.title: Increase Conversions & Site Growth
index.subheader:
%s notifications were created & customized by our users.
Increase your website's growth by using our notification widgets.

steps.one_text: Easily integrate it on any website with just one line of code.
steps.two_text: Create and customize your notification however you like it.
steps.three_text: Generate more leads, conversions and growth. It's that easy.

main.logo_help: jpg, jpeg, png and svg accepted. Recommended size: Max height of 40px and transparrent.
main.favicon_help: jpg, jpeg, png and ico accepted.
main.register_is_enabled_help: Disable / Enable User Registration depending on your usage of the platform.
main.index_url_help: Set the full custom index url ( ex: https://google.com/ ) if you want to completely disable the default landing page of the product. Helpful when you want to have your own landing page. Leave empty to disable.

payment.is_enabled_help: Disabling the payment system will remove all the options for the users to upgrade their accounts or see any payment related information.

payment.currency_help: Currency Code for the payments (ex: USD).

smtp.host_help: If there are no values entered in this field then the system will try to use the default mail function.

custom.head_js_help: Add your own tracking js code ( ex: Google Analytics ).
custom.head_css_help: Add custom CSS in case you want to overwrite certain styles of the website.
